message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a fantastic product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I'm not sure I can go as low as $100. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $110.
I appreciate the offer, but I'm still a bit higher than that. How about we meet in the middle at $105?
I'm not quite ready to meet you at $105, Bob. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I get a good deal. I'll offer it to you for $115.
I'm starting to think I'm not going to find a better deal elsewhere, but I'm still not comfortable with $115. How about we meet at $108?
I'm glad you're interested in the product, Bob! I can see you're willing to make a serious offer. I'll meet you at $110, but I think I can do a bit better than that. I'll offer it to you for $112.
I appreciate the offer, but I'm not sure I can go up to $112. I'm willing to meet you at $109, but that's as high as I can go
I think we're getting close, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $110, but I'm not going to go any higher than that. I'll offer it to you for $110.
